mapper.sql: url, title, content_text, content_html, src_url, src_name, publish_time, crawler_src, last_update_time, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName} ( url, title, content_html, publish_time ) values ( #{url}, #{title}, #{contentHtml}, str_to_date(#{publishTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') )

insert into ${tableName} ( url, title, src_url, src_name, publish_time, crawler_src, last_update_time, create_time ) values ( #{url}, #{title}, #{srcUrl}, #{srcName}, str_to_date(#{publishTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{crawlerSrc}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT url, title, content_html as contentHtml, DATE_FORMAT(publish_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as publishTime FROM ${tableName} WHERE url=#{url}
mapper.update: CREATE TABLE if not EXISTS ${tableName} ( `url` varchar(250) NOT NULL COMMENT '新闻url连接', `title` varchar(200) NOT NULL COMMENT '新闻标题', `content_html` longtext COMMENT '新闻内容html格式', `publish_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '新闻发布时间', PRIMARY KEY (`url`), UNIQUE KEY `url_index` (`url`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE if not EXISTS ${tableName} ( `url` varchar(250) NOT NULL COMMENT '新闻url连接', `title` varchar(200) NOT NULL COMMENT '新闻标题', `src_url` varchar(600) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '新闻来源链接', `src_name` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '新闻来源', `publish_time` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '新闻发布时间', `crawler_src` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '爬取的网站', `last_update_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `create_time` timestamp NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`url`), UNIQUE KEY `url_index` (`url`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
